title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit                   News               Photos and Multimedia               History & Culture               Nature               Kids & Youth               Management         Â    Are you coming to the park? Excellent!! Use these links to find out all the information you want to know before setting a foot in the park.  Basic Information - Read about the most essential information on the park. Directions and Transportation - Find out how to get here and how you can to do it. Things to Do - Hiking, painting, tours, inspiration; find out everything you can experience. Calendar - Check out information on the upcoming events at the park. Safety - Learn how to stay safety smart while enjoying your visit here. Accessibility - Discover more about the park's accessibility for all visitors.
